item.title: Argue, Argue not on behalf of those who deceive themselves
Argue, You argued for them in this world, but who will on the Day of Resurrection
Burden, Allah burdens not a person beyond his scope
Burden, Disbelievers will bear also the burdens of others
Burden, Evil indeed are the burdens that they will bear
Burden, No bearer of burdens shall bear the burden of another
Charity, Objects of charity and Zakat
Children, They are lost who have killed their children, from folly, without knowledge
Creation, Allah commands "Be!" and it is
Creation, Every living thing is made from
Creation, The first form of creation
Creation, as the twinkling of the eye
Creation, of heaven and earth greater than creation of mankind
Creation, of night and day, sun and moon
Dead, Dead will be raised up
Decree, For each and every matter, there is a Decree
Decree, Never did We destroy a township but there was a known decree for it
Decree, When He decrees a matter, He says only "Be!" and it is,
Decree, of every matter is from Allah
Deeds, Deeds fastened to his own neck
Deeds, Evil deeds beautified for them
Deeds, Good and bad deeds are for and against his ownself
Deeds, To us our deeds and to you your deeds
Degrees according to what they did
Desires, Those who follow their evil desires
Desires, Who has taken as his god his own desires
Despair not of the Mercy of Allah (see also Jonah)
Disease in the hearts of hypocrites and disbelievers
Every nation has its appointed term, none can anticipate nor delay it
Evil, Changed evil for the good
Evil, Those follow their evil desires
Evil, comes from ourselves but good from Allah
Evil, has appeared on land and sea
Evil, should not be uttered in public
Excess, Being excess in forbidding food
Eyes, ears and skins will bear witness against sinners
Face or Countenance Of Allah, In the Remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest
Face or Countenance Of Allah, Remembrance
Face or Countenance Of Allah, Remembrance of Allah
Faith (Belief), He has guided you to the faith
False conversation about Verses of Qur'an
False gods, idols and so-called partners besides Allah
False gods, idols and so-called partners besides Allah
Fastened man's deeds to his own neck
Fasting, Eat and drink until white thread appears distinct from the black thread
Fighting, against those who believe not in Allah
Fighting, in the Cause of Allah, and oppressed men and women
Fighting, in the way of Allah against disbelievers
Fighting, permission against those who are wronged
Food, Lawful and unlawful (Halal and Haram) food
Food, Make not unlawful which Allah has made lawful
Food, No sin for what ate in the past
Forgiveness, Allah forgives not setting up partners in worship with Him
Forgiveness, Allah forgives whom He pleases
Forgiveness, Angels ask for forgiveness for those on the earth
Forgiveness, Believers to forgive those who hope not for the Days of Allah
Forgiveness, Forgive when they are angry
Forgiveness, Not to ask Allah's forgiveness for the Mushrikun
Forgiveness, Race one with another in hastening towards forgiveness
Forgiveness, for those who avoid great sins and the Fawahish
Free will, Take a path to his Lord
Free will, Whosoever wills, let him: believe and disbelieve
Free will, limited by Allah's Will
Game in a state of Ihram
Good and Evil, Allah rewards those who do with what is best
Good and Evil, Do good, as Allah has been good to you
Good and Evil, Every person will be confronted with all the Good and Evil, he has done
Good and Evil, For those who do good, there is good and the home of Hereafter
Good and Evil, Good and the evil deed cannot be equal,
Good and Evil, Good deed, disclose or conceal it
Good and Evil, Good is for those who do good in this world
Good and Evil, Good is from Allah and evil is from yourself
Good and Evil, Good rewarded double
Good and Evil, Good rewarded ten times
Good and Evil, Good to be rewarded
Good and Evil, If you do good, for your ownselves and if you do evil, against yourselves
Good and Evil, Is there any reward for good, other than good,
Good and Evil, Repel evil with good
Good and Evil, Strive as in a race in good deed
Good and Evil, You dislike a thing which is good, and like which is bad
Guard your Territory by army units
Hands and legs will bear witness
Hardship, There is relief with every hardship
Hearts, In whose hearts there is a disease
Heaven, Creation of seven heavens in two days
Heaven, Seven heavens, one above another
Heaven, There is nothing hidden in the heaven
Heaven, To Allah belong the unseen of the Heavens
Heaven, To Allah belongs all that is in the Heaves
Heaven, adorned nearest heaven with lamps
Heaven, and the earth were joined together
Heaven, created not for a play
Heaven, will be rolled up in His Right Hand
Hereafter, Better is the house in the Hereafter
Hereafter, Which will be the end in the Hereafter
Hereafter, Who believe not in the Hereafter
Hereafter, Zalimun will not be successful in the Hereafter
Hereafter, better than silver and gold
Hour, All of a sudden it is on them
Hour, The knowledge of the Hour is with Allah only
Hour, as a twinkling of the eye, or even nearer
Hour, surely coming there is no doubt
Hour, will be established on the Day
Hypocrites, Allah has cast them back
Hypocrites, Allah knows what is in their hearts
Hypocrites, Allah will punish the hypocrites
Hypocrites, afraid of being found out
Hypocrites, belong neither to these nor to those
Hypocrites, go for judgement to false judges, turn away from Revelation, come when a catastrophe befalls
Hypocrites, if they turn back, kill them wherever you find them
Hypocrites, in fear of death and darkness
Hypocrites, in losses depths of Fire, no helper
Hypocrites, in misfortune and in a great success
Hypocrites, liars; made their oaths a screen: their heart are sealed; beware of them,
Hypocrites, liars; turning their backs; there hearts are dvided,
Hypocrites, men and women are from one another: losrs; Curse of Allah,
Hypocrites, not to be taken as friends
Hypocrites, not to pray for them
Hypocrites, say: we believe in Allah and the Last Day, but in fact believe not
Hypocrites, they pray with laziness and to be seen of men
Hypocrites, they wait and watch for your victory or disbelievers success
Hypocrites, wherever found, they shall be seized and killed
Illegal sexual intercourse; evidence Of witnesses
Injustice, to whom it has been done
Islam, First of those who submit as Muslims
Israel, Bestowed favour on Children of Israel
Israel, Children of Israel ask for a king
Israel, Children of Israel bought the life of this world at the price of Hereafter
Israel, Children of Israel delivered from enemy
Israel, Children of Israel exceeded the limits, broken into various groups, monkeys
Israel, Children of Israel greediest of mankind for life
Israel, Children of Israel promised twice
Israel, Children of Israel rebelling against Allah's obedience
Israel, Israel given Scripture and leaders
Israel, The learned scholars of the Children of Israel knew Qur'an as true
Jesus, Disciples said: we are Muslims
Jesus, Glad tidings Of a Messenger whose name shall be Ahmed
Jesus, Isa son of Mary, glad tidings of birth
Jesus, Messenger to the Children of Israel
Jesus, Our Messenger Muhammad SAW has come
Jesus, no more than a slave and an example to the Children of Israel
Jesus, they have disbelieved who say
Jews, accursed for what they uttered
Jews, enmity to the believers, Muslims
John the Baptist, Glad tidings of John(Yahya)
John the Baptist, wise, sympathetic, dutiful
Kaaba, going round in naked state
Kaaba, while praying and going round
Key, of the heavens and the earth
Killing, If anyone killed a person he killed all mankind
Kind words are better than charity
Knowledge, Lost are they who have killed their children from folly without knoledge
Knowledge, Not a leaf falls, but He knows it
Knowledge, five things with Allah Alone
Life, Bought the Life of this world, at the price of Hereafter
Life, Glad tidings in the Life of this world
Life, If anyone saved a life, he saved the life of all mankind
Life, Likeness of Life of this world is as the rain
Life, Little is the enjoyment of the Life of this world than the Hereafter
Life, Sell the Life of this world, for the Hereafter
Life, Who love the present and neglect the Hereafter
Life, Whoever desires Life of this world, gets therein: but then there will be no portion in the Hereafter
Life, You prefer the Life of this world
Life, of this world, is nothing but amusement and play
Life, of this world, is only the enjoyment of deception
Light, given by Allah, that the Believers may walk straight
Light, goes before and with the Believers
Limits, Do not exceed the Limits set by Allah in your religion
Limits, Forced by necessity, nor transgressing the Limits set by Allah
Limits, These are the Limits set by Allah
Limits, Transgress not the Limits set by Allah
Limits, When they exceeded the became monkeys Limits set by Allah
Limits, Who observe the Limits set by Allah
Limits, Whosoever transgresses Limits set by Allah
Loan, Lend to Allah a goodly loan
Man, Allah has subjected for you whatsoever is in the heaven and earth, whosoever submits his face to Allah
Man, Created and decreed a stated term
Man, Effforts and deeds are divers
Man, Fashioned perfectly and given due proportion
Man, Generations after generations on earth
Man, Reconciliation between man and wife
Man, created of the best stature (moulds)
Man, have broken their religion into sects, each rejoicing in its belief
Man, his deeds fastened to his neck
Man, kindred by blood and marriage
Man, losers who denied their Meeting with Allah
Man, loves the present life of this world
Man, misfortunes because of what his hands have earned
Man, more difficult to create, or is the heaven
Man, not two hearts inside his body
Man, shall not bear the burden of another
Man, smooth for him the path of Ease, and Evil
Man, sorted out into three classes
Man, then reduced to the lowest Of the low
Man, to be transfigured and created in forms unknown
Man, tongues, hands and feet will bear witness against
Man, travels from stage to stage
Man, wealth and children are only a trial
Man, who has taken as his god his own desire
Man, whoever goes astray, to his own loss and goes right, only for his ownself
Man, wife and children, when harm or evil touches
Mankind, heedless though Reckoning is near
Mankind, made into nations and tribes
Manners, not to annoy Allah and His Messenger or believing men or women
Manners, to greet and send Salat on the Prophet
Marriage, Before sexual intercourse, no Iddah on divorce
Marriage, If breach feared, two arbitrators to be appointed
Marriage, If no means to wed free believing women
Marriage, If wife fears cruelty or desertion, make terms of peace
Marriage, Mahr not to be taken back in case of divorce
Marriage, Not incline too much to one wife so as to leave the other hanging
Marriage, Those who find not the financial means for marriage
Marriage, to those who are poor
Marriage, wives male lawful to the Prophet
Martyr, rejoice in Grace and Bounty from Allah
Mary, brought the baby to her people
Messenger, An angel as a Messenger
Messenger, Believing in some and rejecting others
Messenger, For every nation, there is a Messenger
Messengers, and their wives and offspring
Messengers, as a witness from every nation
Messengers, no more than human beings
Messengers, sent as givers of glad tidings and warners
Moses, and calf-worship of his people
Moses, guided to the Right Path
Moses, his childhood, mother and sister
Moses, his mishap in the city
Moses, to the junction of the two seas
Moses,’ Book and differences arose therein
Mosque, To maintain mosques of Allah
Muhammad, Allah is Witness over him
Muhammad, Ayat regarding family of Muhammad
Muhammad, Bai'ah (pledge) to him is Bai'ah (pledge) to Allah Muhammad
Muhammad, Covenant to believe in Muhammad
Muhammad, Men who hurt the Prophet
Muhammad, Muhammad close to the believers
Muhammad, Muhammad exalted standard of character
Muhammad, Muhammad from the darkness to the light
Muhammad, Muhammad good example to follow
Muhammad, Muhammad has been commanded to,
Muhammad, Muhammad sent as a great favour to the believers
Muhammad, Who accuse you, O Muhammad
Muhammad, a mercy to the Believers
Muhammad, as a mercy from Allah
Muhammad, no more than a Messenger
Muhammad, not a new thing in the Messengers
Muhammad, not a poet or soothsayer
Muhammad, only follow that which is revealed
Muhammad, sent as a witness, bearer of glad tidings and a warner
Muhammad, sent to be a witness
Muhammad, sent to the mankind as the Messenger of Allah
Muhammad, to invite with wisdom and fair preaching, and argue in a better way
Muhammad, to make Religion of Truth victorious over all religions
Muhammad, to prostrate and draw near to Allah
Muhammad, to strive hard against disbelievers and hypocrites
Muhammad, wage is from Allah only
Muhammad, witness from among the Children of Israel
Muhsinun, Allah is with the Muhsinun
Muhsinun, Allah loses not the reward of the Muhsinun
Muhsinun, Allah's Mercy is near to the Muhsinun
Muhsinun, Glad tidings to the Muhsinun
Muhsinun, Muhsinun are Dutiful and good to parents
Muhsinun, Patient in performing duties to Allah
Muslims, Forgiveness and a great reward for them
Name, To Him belong the Best Names
Name, To Him belong the Most Beautiful Names
Necessity, If one is forced by necessity
Never did We destroy a town, but there was a known decree for it
Offspring, He bestows male and female, upon whom He wills
Own doings, made fair-seeming to people
Parables, A man belonging to many partners
Parables, A town all in utter ruins
Parables, Ashes on which the wind blows furiously
Parables, Darkness in a vast deep sea
Parables, Dog who lolls his tongue out
Parables, Dumb man who is a burden to his master
Parables, Falllen from the sky and snatched by bird,
Parables, Life of this world like water from the sky
Parables, Light is as a niche
Parables, Rain storm from the sky
Parables, Township, secure and well content
Parables, Two men with gardens of grapes
Parables, Water were to be sunk away
Paradise, Allah is pleased with them and they with Him
Paradise, Dwellers of Paradise will be busy in joyful things that Day
Paradise, Facing one another on thrones
Paradise, Gardens under which rivers flow
Paradise, Hurs, chaste females with wide and beautiful eyes, as if preserved egg
Paradise, Immortal boy-servants to serve them, as scattered pearls
Paradise, Kauthar, a river in Paradise
Paradise, Whoever does righteous deeds will enter paradise
Paradise, Wives in pleasant shade, reclining on thrones
Paradise, Young full-breasted maidens of equal age
Paradise, adorned with bracelets of gold and pearls
Paradise, beautiful mansions, lofty rooms, one above another
Paradise, been made to inherit because of deeds
Paradise, coaches lined with silk brocade
Paradise, for believers are Gardens as an entertainment
Paradise, fruits of all kinds as desired, in plenty
Paradise, fruits will be near at hand
Paradise, green cushions and rich beautiful mattresses, set in row
Paradise, green garments of fine and thick silk
Paradise, hatred or sense of injury removed from their hearts
Paradise, neither excessive heat nor bitter cold
Paradise, neither harmful speech nor falsehood
Paradise, neither will be any hurt, abdominal pain, headache nor intoxication
Paradise, no sense of fatigue, toil or weariness
Paradise, no vain speaking nor sinful speech
Paradise, nor they (ever) be asked to leave it
Paradise, pure sealed wine, white, delicious
Paradise, rivers of wine, milk, clarified honey
Paradise, see the angels surrounding the Throne
Paradise, there will be a known provision
Paradise, they will have all that they desire
Paradise, thornless lote trees and Talh (banana trees)
Paradise, thrones woven with gold and precious stones, raised high
Paradise, trays of gold and cups
Paradise, vessels of silver and cups of crystal
Paradise, who kept their duty to their Lord will be led in groups
Paradise, will be amidst gardens and water springs
Partner, Partners of Allah, a falsehood
Patience, Allah is with those who are patient
Patience, If patient will receive reward in full
Patience, Patient in performing duties to Allah
Patience, Seek help in patience, and prayer
Patience, To be patient at the time of anger
Person, Allah burdens not a person beyond his scope
Person, Allah swears by the self-reproaching person
Person, Allah tax not any person except according to his capacity
Person, Every person is a pledge for what he has earned
Person, Every person will be confronted with all the good and evil he has done
Person, Every person will come up pleading for himself
Person, No person knows what he will earn tomorrow and in what land he will die
Pharaoh, A believing man from Pharaoh's family
Pharaoh, dead body out from sea
Pharaoh, transgressed beyond bounds, committed sins and disobeyed
Piling up of the worldly things
Pledge (Bai'ah), to the Messenger is Bai'ah (pledge) to Allah
Pledge, Every person is a Pledge (Mortgaging), for that which he has earned
Pledge, let there be a Pledge (Mortgaging)
Prayer, Five obligatory, seek help in patience and prayer
Prayer, He answers (the invocation of) those
Prayer, approach not when in a drunken state
Prayer, neither aloud nor in a low voice
Prayer, not in a state of Janabah
Prophet, An enemy for every prophets
Prostration, To Allah falls in prostration, whoever in the heavens and the earth and so do their shadows
Punishment, Cutting of hands or feet
Punishment, Punish them with the like of that with which you were afflicted
Punishment, Punishment of this life and Hereafter
Quran, Allah is Witness to it
Quran, False conversation about Verses of Quran
Quran, Think deeply in the Quran
Quran, When you want to recite the Quran
Quran, Word that separates the truth from falsehood
Quran, a Reminder to (all) the Alamin
Quran, an absolute truth with certainty
Quran, an anguish for the disbelievers
Quran, fully explained to mankind, every kind of similitude and example, but most refuse
Quran, had it been from other than Allah, therein have been much contradictions
Quran, if sent down on a mountain
Quran, in Records held in honour, kept pure and holy
Quran, is not such as could ever be produced than Allah
Quran, made into parts, and revealed in stages
Quran, narrates to the Children Of Israel about which they differ
Quran, non can touch but who are pure
Quran, recitation in the early dawn is ever witnessed (by the angels)
Quran, recite in a slow style
Quran, therein is decreed every matter of ordainments
Quran, when recited, listen and be silent
Race, Strive as in a race in good deeds
Ransom, No ransom shall be taken
Recompense, of an evil is an evil like thereof
Record, Each nation will be called to its record
Record, written pages of deeds of every person
Religion, Do not exceed the limits in religion
Religion, Mankind created on the religion
Religion, Men have broken their religion in to sects, each group rejoicing in its belief
Religion, Not laid in any hardship inreligion
Religion, Who divide their religion and break up into sects
Religion, Who take religion as play and amusement
Repentance, He accepts repentance and forgives sins
Repentance, accepted if evil done in ignorance repent soon afterwards
Repentance, have no effect if evil deeds are continued
Resurrection Day, A man shall flee from his relatives
Resurrection Day, A person will know what he has sent forward and left behind
Resurrection Day, All in heaven and on the earth will swoon away
Resurrection Day, All the secrets will be examined
Resurrection Day, Angels will be sent down with a grand descending
Resurrection Day, Bear a heavy burden
Resurrection Day, Believers will be amidst shades and springs, and fruits
Resurrection Day, Dard day, for the disbelievers
Resurrection Day, Day of Grief and Regrets
Resurrection Day, Day of Sorting out
Resurrection Day, Deniers of Resurrection Day
Resurrection Day, Destruction with deep regrets sorrows and despair
Resurrection Day, Dwellers of Paradise and their wives
Resurrection Day, Earth and the mountains will be shaken violently
Resurrection Day, Earth as a levelled plain
Resurrection Day, Earth is ground to powder
Resurrection Day, Earth is stretched forth
Resurrection Day, Earth throws out its burdens
Resurrection Day, Earth will be changed to another earth and so will be the heavens
Resurrection Day, Earthquake of the Hour
Resurrection Day, Every person will be confronted with all the good and evil he has done
Resurrection Day, Every person will know what he has brought
Resurrection Day, Every pregnant will drop her load
Resurrection Day, Graves turned upside down
Resurrection Day, Heaven is split asunder
Resurrection Day, Heaven shall be opened, it will become as gates
Resurrection Day, Heaven shall be rent asunder with clouds
Resurrection Day, Heaven will be rolled up, in His Right Hand
Resurrection Day, Hell will be brought near
Resurrection Day, Hell-Fire shall be stripped off, kindled to fierce ablaze
Resurrection Day, Mankind as in a drunken state
Resurrection Day, Mankind will be like moths scattered about
Resurrection Day, Mankind will proceed in scattered groups
Resurrection Day, Mountains will move away
Resurrection Day, No fear of injustice
Resurrection Day, No fear on believers
Resurrection Day, No friend will ask of a friend
Resurrection Day, No person shall have power to do anything for another
Resurrection Day, Not permitted to put forth any excuse
Resurrection Day, Nursing mother will forget her nursling
Resurrection Day, Paid your wages in full
Resurrection Day, Paradise shall be brought near
Resurrection Day, Pregnant she-camels shall be neglected
Resurrection Day, Record given behind back
Resurrection Day, Record given in left hand
Resurrection Day, Record given in right hand
Resurrection Day, Relatives shall be made to see one another
Resurrection Day, Resurrection Day like flakes of wool
Resurrection Day, Resurrection Day or part of a day
Resurrection Day, Resurrection Day over the earth alive after death
Resurrection Day, Resurrection from the graves
Resurrection Day, Retaliation by way of charity will be an expiation
Resurrection Day, Seas are burst forth
Resurrection Day, Seas shall become as blazing Fire
Resurrection Day, Shin shall be laid bare
Resurrection Day, Sky will be like the boiling filth of Oil
Resurrection Day, Stars will lose their lights
Resurrection Day, Stay no longer than a day
Resurrection Day, Stay not longer than ten days
Resurrection Day, Sun will lose its light
Resurrection Day, The caller will call, to a terrible thing
Resurrection Day, The female buried alive shall be questioned
Resurrection Day, The heaven will shake with a dreadful shaking
Resurrection Day, The souls shall be joined with their bodies
Resurrection Day, There will be no friend nor an intercessor
Resurrection Day, Trumpet will be blown
Resurrection Day, Whosoever does good or evil equal to the weight of an atom, shall see it
Resurrection Day, Wild beasts shall be gathered together
Resurrection Day, Will have no power, nor any helper
Resurrection Day, Written pages of deeds shall be laid open
Resurrection Day, Wrong-doer will bite at his hands
Resurrection Day, Wrong-doers assembled with their companions and idols
Revelation, a Guidance and a Mercy
Revelation, from the Lord, so be not Of those who doubt
Revelation, if you are in doubt
Revelation, of the Book is from Allah
Reward, Allah rewards those who do good, with what is best
Reward, according to the best of deeds and even more
Reward, for good, no reward other than good
Right guidance is the Guidance of Allah
Sadaqah (Charity), Sadaqah, concealing is better than showing
Sail Al-Arim (flood released from Marib Dam)
Satan, has no power over believers
Satan, throws falsehood, is an enemy
Scriptures, among them who are on the right course
Scriptures, people of the (Jews and Christians)
Scriptures, they recognise but not believe
Sea, When seas are burst forth
Sects, Sects and divisions in religion
Security, He sent down security after the distress
Shadow, To Allah falls in prostration
She-camel as a clear sign to Thamud people
Ships, Sailing of ship as a Sign to be of service, to be grateful, to seek His Bounty
Sin, Allah forgives not setting up partners in worship with Him but forgives whom He pleases other sins than that
Sin, If greater sins are avoided, small sins are remitted
Sin, Sinners will never be successful
Sin, Sinners, their ears, eyes, and skins will testify against them
Sin, They may hide sins from men, but cannot hide from Allah
Sin, Those who commit sin, will get due recompense
Sin, Whoever earns a sin, and then throws on to someone innocent
Sin, Whoever earns sin, he earns it only against himself
Sleep, Sleep, a thing for rest
Solomon, and the Queen of Saba
Spend, Likeness of those who spend, their wealth in the way of Allah
Spend, Whatever you speand in Allah's cause, it will be repaid to you
Spend, Who close hands from spending in Allah's cause
Spend, not with extravagance, or wastefully
Spend, to be seen of men
Spend, which is beyond your needs
Spirit, Allah strengthens believers with spirit
Spirit, Spirit (soul, Ruh) its knowledge is with Allah
Successful are those whose scale will be heavy
Suffering, Suffering poverty loss of health and calamities; prosperity and wealth
The term of suckling of foster mother
Throne, Eight angels bearing the throne
Travel, Have they not travelled through the earth
Trumpet on the Day of Resurrection
Trust, Trust offered to heavens, earth and mountains, but undertaken by man
Truth, Mix not with falsehood nor conceal
Truth, Truth has come and falsehood has vanished
Wait you, we too are waiting
Water, Allah's Throne on the water
Water, Every living thing made from water
Wealth, Wealth and children, adornment of the life of this world
Who love the present and leave the Hereafter
Will of man, to walk straight
Wind, as heralds of glad tidings
Wish not for the things in which Allah has made some to excel others
Witness, Witnessing Day and Witnessed Day
Witness, hands and legs will bear witness
Witness, to covenant of the prophets
Witness, two women against one man
Wives, are a tilth for you
Women, Women, not making clear herself in dispute
World, Life of this world is nothing but play and amusement
World, Little is the enjoyment of the world than the Hereafter
World, Wealth and children adornment of the world
World, Whoever desires this world, gets therein, but then there will be no portion in the Hereafter
Zaid Ibn Harithah, slave of the Prophet
Zakat, Objects of Zakat and charity
